mIIGH1zK7Ih0o-1r-.name: Diffuse
mIIGH1zK7Ih0o-1r-.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mUqZgUUA-NhS_tLJq.name: Homogenous
mUqZgUUA-NhS_tLJq.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

m3mcTgxLA5vfzc4GO.name: No Blood
m3mcTgxLA5vfzc4GO.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mzpZAHraGgWJcHM_f.name: No Brain
mzpZAHraGgWJcHM_f.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mXqseknE-QCpKZySi.name: No Eyes
mXqseknE-QCpKZySi.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m6Xk7KsDqAHQxFRS-.name: No Head
m6Xk7KsDqAHQxFRS-.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mYXUHSwZAZpwviMzw.name: No Neck
mYXUHSwZAZpwviMzw.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m8diIwzsaDqxvunbk.name: No Vitals
m8diIwzsaDqxvunbk.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mwQJQ0yv_ZgkIrRnp.name: Unliving
mwQJQ0yv_ZgkIrRnp.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
